answers.answer: Go to l&D. High blood pressure and visual disturbances can be dangerous. Next time u have a severe headache or visual disturbance go straight to l&D and maybe call ur dr monday to lef them know whats going on
Thanks hun... I just went to cvs to check my blood pressure and got evening primrose oil capsules... 136/89 good or bad?

120/80 is a 'normal' or 'perfect' blood pressure. Yours is a little elevated, but not anything that's too concerning. Do you know what your blood pressure was before pregnancy?It still doesn't hurt to speak to your doctor about your BP and ask if its ok.
There are other things that can cause it to be elevated as well. When you go to take it, make sure you're sitting and resting first for a more accurate one.
My bp always been like 122/82 or highest 128/83
Before I take bp I wait 5 to 10 mins before taking it...
Normal is actually 140/80. The bottom number s the one you really have to watch. I had pre eclampsia with my son.
It really just depends on various medical conditions as well.http://www.nhlbi.nih.gov/hbp/detect/categ.htm

question: Three days ago my blood pressure was 144/100.... (Checked at home.) Then I went to Walmart two days ago and bp was 139/83.... Does those bp numbers indicate I have preeclampsia??? What should I do??? BTW I've been having slight headaches, vision alil dizzy... I also have doctor appointment Thursday.I'm 34 weeks and 2 days... Thanks
title: preeclampsia??? please read
